structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: No person shall be required to attend as a witness in a civil case or for the defendant in a criminal case except a person summonsed to attend as a witness for an indigent defendant in a criminal case, unless the legal fees for one dayâ€™s attendance and for travel to and from the place where he is required to attend are paid or tendered to him.
